meanings.definition: A person who performs household tasks or duties.
meanings.sent1: The choreman swept the floor every morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom hired a choreman to help with cleaning the house.
meanings.sent3: The choreman accidentally vacuumed up a sock!
meanings.sent4: She moved through the house like a choreman, efficiently completing each task.
meanings.sent5: The choreman's apron was always filled with cleaning supplies.

meanings.definition: To assign or delegate tasks to someone.
meanings.sent1: I will choreman the cleaning duties to my sister.
meanings.sent2: The manager choremans the responsibilities to different team members.
meanings.sent3: He choremans the tasks with a smile, making it seem easy.
meanings.sent4: She choremans the work like a conductor leading an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: Choremaning tasks effectively requires good organization skills.
